name: todo
description: **Functional specifications** •                   Todo list should be saved (after browser closing) you can use local storage for that •                   User can add the todo datetime (in the todo creation process) •                   Use badge to show current state of the todo (done or todo) •                   User can mark todo as (todo or done) // use drop down •                   User can mark todo as important •                   User can (undo redo) the todolist state (max 5 steps) •                   Add todo datetime (when user create the todo) •                   Show an alert message (if actual date == the todo date)           **Technical specifications**                •                   Use es6 standards •                   Use webpack •                   Use a modular approche (prepare the conception)
